scenario.description: Configure a twitter analytics scenario to display statistics for a given stream of your choice

artifacts.artifact:
<twitter-analytic-app> <twitter-config> <consumer-secret>$conSecret</consumer-secret> <consumer-key>$conKey</consumer-key> <access-token>$accToken</access-token> <access-secret>$accSecret</access-secret> </twitter-config> <group name="$GroupOneTitle"> <sub-group name="$GroupOneSubGroupOne"> <hash-tag>$htagListOne</hash-tag> </sub-group> <sub-group name="$GroupOneSubGroupTwo"> <hash-tag>$htagListTwo</hash-tag> </sub-group> </group> <group name="$GroupTwoTitle"> <sub-group name="$GroupTwoSubGroupOne"> <hash-tag>$htagListThree</hash-tag> </sub-group> <sub-group name="$GroupTwoSubGroupTwo"> <hash-tag>$htagListFour</hash-tag> </sub-group> </group> <group name="$Default"> <hash-tag>$htagListDefault</hash-tag> </group> <management-console> <username>"$esbUn"</username> <password>"$esbPwd"</password> </management-console>
</twitter-analytic-app>
